title: Statements made about infidelity
context: Confess to cheating or confront a partner about being unfaithful.

content.bestLine: I need to talk to you about us, something's not right

Can we talk about what's going on between us?

I want to be honest with you about my feelings
I think we should discuss our commitment to each other

I need to know what's going on with you
